text: The Institute for the Study of War is an American nonprofit research group and think tank founded in 2007 by military historian Kimberly Kagan. It provides research and analysis regarding issues of defense and foreign affairs. The Institute of War Studies advances military affairs through reliable research, analysis, and innovative education.The institute is committed to improving the nation's capabilities to conduct military operations and respond to threats in order to achieve US strategic objectives. ==References== Category:Think tanks based in the United States
title: Institute for the Study of War
